{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WAC124 |revision= |series=AC2000 |upc=606449135756 |asin=B07L1QMDKF, B01N47QKDQ;GB; |newegg=9SIA1YH98X2314 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |est_release_date=01/2018 |fcc_date=05/03/2018 |fcc_id=PY318100410 |ic_id=4054A-18100410 |pcb_id=CHJ00-1.6 |type=access point, wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT;MEDIATEK, MT7621AT, 1724-AMTH, CTPFAT98, DTPFAR85; |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G18AC-TI |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M15T1G1664A-AZC1 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (57600 8N1),, J4 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7603EN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Diodes Incorporated;AZ1117E;;2; |flags=power switch |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink 4.2.1.0; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NETGEAR-1 |default_ip=192.168.0.100 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=CC:40:D0 |oui_eth=CC:40:D0 }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''AC2000'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2000 Dual Band 4x4 Wireless Access Point/Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/business/products/wireless/essentials-wireless/WAC124.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=WAC124}} "CHJ00-1.6" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This is the same as the [[Netgear R6260]] (SerComm). {{See also|Netgear WAC series|SerComm}} As with the [[Netgear R6260]] they are assumed to be :[[MediaTek MT7615]] and [[MediaTek]] MT7603E. Radio Chip IDs are not visible. ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] [[MediaTek MT7621AT|MT7621AT]] @880MHz ''Dual Core/Quad Thread'' [[MIPS]] 1004Kc *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 128MB SLC NAND Flash *WiFi: [[MediaTek MT7615N]] (802.11an+ac), [[MediaTek]] MT7603EN (802.11bgn) *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 1.5A via barrel ===See also=== *[[Netgear R6220]] *[[Netgear R6260]] *[[Netgear R6350]] *[[Netgear R6800]] *[[Netgear R6850]] ==Images== ---- File:NETGEAR WAC124 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:NETGEAR WAC124 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
